comments:
I'm not sure I can reproduce this one unfortunately :(  I was working with my
sample schema and right clicked on the editor between the Extension Point
Elements section and the Element Grammar Section, clicked on "Cut" and then
clicked on "Paste" in the description section.  

A ClassCastException error (as below) resulted.

Easiest solution is probably to disable Cut and Copy on any areas outside known
sections. :)

Fixed.  the context menu doesn't show up if there is no selection.
